00020 #include "config.h"

00025 // Define this if all connections should be allocated at once
00026 // when loading map. It also means that one has to keep track
00027 // of which connections, that are created when loading the map
00028 // and which connections that are created when e.g. adding a
00029 // disturbance.
00030 #define PREALLOC_CONNECTIONS
00031 
00032 
00033 #define GET_ZOOM_LEVEL(a) (((a) & 0x7fffffff) >> 27)
00034 
00035 #define IS_NODE0(a) ((uint32(a)&0x80000000)==0)
00036 
00037 #define SUBROUTE_LOWLEVEL 0x30000000
00038 #define LEVEL_MASK        0x78000000
00039 
00040 // Old version of lowerlevel
00041 //#define IS_LOWER_LEVEL(a) ( ( (a) & LEVEL_MASK ) == SUBROUTE_LOWLEVEL)
00042 
00043 // Level is now defined in OverviewMap.h
00044 // This macro could be optimized. It's not very optimized by -O3
00045 //   andl $2147483647,%eax
00046 //   shrl $27,%eax
00047 //   cmpl $5,%eax
00048 // The solution would be to preshift the zoomlevel.
00049 #define IS_LOWER_LEVEL(a) ( GET_ZOOM_LEVEL(a) > \
00050                          (uint32)OverviewMap::maxZoomLevelStreetSegmentItems )
00051 
00052 #define IS_UPPER_LEVEL(a) (!IS_LOWER_LEVEL(a))
00053 #if 1
00054 // REAL
00055 #define HAS_NO_RESTRICTIONS(a) ( (a) == ItemTypes::noRestrictions )
00056 #define HAS_NO_THROUGHFARE(a) ( (a) == ItemTypes::noThroughfare )
00057 // END REAL
00058 
00059 #else
00060 // BEGIN TESTING
00061 #define HAS_NO_RESTRICTIONS(a) ( ((a) == ItemTypes::noRestrictions) || \
00062                                  ((a) == ItemTypes::noThroughfare) ) 
00063 // This will not work if the order changes...
00064 // #define HAS_NO_RESTRICTIONS(a) ( (a) < ItemTypes::noEntry )
00065 #define HAS_NO_THROUGHFARE(a) ( false )
00066 #endif
00067 // END TESTING
00068 
00069 #define HAS_NO_ENTRY(a) ( (a) == ItemTypes::noEntry )
00070 #define HAS_NO_WAY(a) ( (a) == ItemTypes::noWay )
00071 #define NO_PASSING(a) ( HAS_NO_RESTRICTIONS(a) || HAS_NO_THROUGHFARE(a) )
00072 #define NOT_VALID(a) ( HAS_NO_ENTRY(a) || HAS_NO_WAY(a) )
00073 
00074 #define IS_WALKING(a) (( (a) & ItemTypes::pedestrian) != 0)
00075 #define IS_DRIVING_BUS(a) (( (a) & ItemTypes::publicTransportation) != 0)
00076 #define IS_DRIVING(a) (!IS_WALKING(a) && !IS_DRIVING_BUS(a))
00077 
00078 #define IS_STATE_ELEMENT(a) ( ( (a) & 0xf0000000 ) == 0xf0000000 )
00079 
00080 #define SEC_TO_TIME_COST(a) ( Connection::secToTimeCost(a) )
00081 #define TIME_COST_TO_SEC(a) ( Connection::timeCostToSec(a) )
00082

00194 inline bool
00195 RouteConstants::isStateElement(uint32 itemID)
00196 {
00197    return GET_TRANSPORTATION_STATE(itemID);
00198 }
